Name: Gaijin Troubles
About the game: School life is not an easy one, especially when you study in a provincial establishment for tough teenage girls. Clubs are more like gangs consisting of pretty-looking bullies, student council performs duties of big Brother watching and making the rules. There is also a bunch of rebels called Sakuban who will probably involve you in some troubles. Mio Shinai is a loner, an ordinary discouraged student. To put it mildly, school days do not cause her any delight. No friends, no motivation, only a relative sense of peace, secured by her fists. But one day everything changes when a foreign student Anne breaks into Mioâ€™s world. The hyperactive blonde works like a magnet for all sorts of troubles and Mio is forced to resolve them. Clumsy naive Annie - will she destroy local stability or become a ray of light in this gloomy reality? Features: Furious action combined with a visual novel. Dramatic non-linear story about bullying and forming bonds. Hardcore combat system with stamina management. Violent girl fights: use a weapon and dirty tricks. RPG elements. You can get stronger. A lot of anime fan service! Warning! All characters in the game are 18+ years old.
